SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.connection.rmi

Interface ServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServer
public interface ServerInterface extends Remote
The ServerInterface extends the Remote interface and provides methods for remote invocation from another Java virtual machine. Any object that implements this interface can be a remote object. This interface is used to define the methods that a client can invoke on the server.

    • registerClient

      void registerClient(ClientInterface client) throws RemoteException
      Registers a client with the server.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to be registered.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • newGame

      void newGame(ClientInterface client, int Gameid, int playerNum, TokenColor value) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new game on the server.
      Parameters:
      client - The client creating the game.
      Gameid - The ID of the game.
      playerNum - The number of players.
      value - The color of the token.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs during the remote method call.
